metaTitle: Find the perfect ultra luxury residences in Tribeca NYC.
metaDescription: Enjoy over 20,000 square feet of amenities including indoor pools, rooftop gardens and fitness center.

intro.title: A Life Well Lived
intro.para: Countless hidden retreats make 108 Leonard more island than urban, an owner's private escape in Tribeca.  Enjoy over 20,000 square feet of amenities including an indoor pool, roof gardens and an approximately 2,200 square foot fitness center.

slides.caption: Wine cellar with private dining room
slides.detail: Discover an entertaining suite replete with private dining, wine cellar and a sumptuous lounge flanked with clubby nooks for intimate conversation.

slides.caption: 75 foot lap pool
slides.detail: Wellness features include a stunning 75 foot lap pool, hot tub, steam shower, sauna and rain shower.

slides.caption: Rooftop gardens featuring cabana lounges
slides.detail: Luxuriant rooftop gardens are designed for dining, lounging and contemplative reflection.

slides.caption: Rooftop outdoor dining
slides.detail: The entertaining cabana offers a fireplace and summer kitchen for nights with friends and family.
